house_listing.house_description: This 1 level detached single family home built in 1957 has 3 bedroom(s), 1.5 bath(s) , 2 car garage and approximately 1107 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, living room, master bedroom. Features include view, patio, air conditioning.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
